body_html: Paging @apaszke; I distinctly remember chatting with him about this when we were writing the PyTorch paper, and when I mentioned to him that Chainer had made it a global flag, Adam seemed pretty convinced that having it as local flags was still a better idea. He managed to convince me at the time but I have now forgotten how I was convinced.
